title: I DID IT MOM! I FUCKIN DID IT!!!!!!
body:
It's close to 1 am in my time area and I just got out of my very last, ridiculously annoying string of of 3v3 Flex games, reaching my goal of Gold V!

Ah. I remember my fresh little face at the start of this season, an average silver scrub who made it to this shiny soon-to-be golden border in SoloQ for the very first time.

And yet it is nothing compared to the ecstasy, this feeling of accomplishment of climbing the third step of this steep ladder that I've felt just now, 2 HOURS before the deadline.

I don't even want the damn skin.

I gotta go to work in 5 hours.

worth it.
